_header: About the field they piped full right
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 49
_description: The Angels appearing to the Shepherds, a carol — seven quatrains (abab) including refrain, ‘Terly terlow tirly terlow’, plus burden (bb): ‘Tyrly tirlow tirly terlow / So merily the sheperdis began to blow’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Abowt þe fyld þei pyped full rightEven abowt þe
                    middes of þe nyght…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Fore to syng & make good chereIn þe worship of god
                    thys yere

OxfBal354.First Lines:
A bowt the feld they pypyd ryghtSo meryly the sheperdis began to
                    blow…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…The whych was never defyledTerly terlow tirly
                    terlowExplicit
